notifications.title: Tax Planning Reminder
notifications.message: Your tax-saving investments are due soon. Consider ELSS funds to maximize your 80C deductions.

notifications.title: Portfolio Update
notifications.message: Your mutual fund portfolio gained ₹5,230 this month. Your SIP investments are performing well.

notifications.title: New Feature Available
notifications.message: Check out our new financial health score feature to better understand your financial wellness.

notifications.title: Nominee Details Missing
notifications.message: 3 of your investments don't have nominee details. Secure your family's financial future.

notifications.title: SIP Payment Successful
notifications.message: Your SIP of ₹5,000 for HDFC Top 100 Fund has been processed successfully.

notifications.title: Market Update
notifications.message: Nifty 50 reached a new high. Consider reviewing your equity allocation for better returns.

notifications.title: Payment Failed
notifications.message: Your SIP payment for ₹3,000 failed due to insufficient funds. Please update your bank details.

notifications.title: Annual Report Ready
notifications.message: Your annual investment report for FY 2023-24 is now available for download.
